data.actual_result: They can manage the channel permissions (even for higher roles than their own)
data.expected_result: People with the testrole (only having manage roles) should not be able to manage the channel permissions
data.short_description: Members with "manage roles" permission can manage channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a role that only has "manage roles" - make sure noone has "manage channels" on server and channel level to isolate the issue
